page.title: 10Rural Industry-Growing Turf.
page.content: Ro-lawn is an example of industry in this area. It is a very successful company which sells different kinds of turf such as football turf, hockey turf,golfing turf and so on. They also sell grass seed but very little its mainly turf. Ro_lawn have their Head office in Elvington but there are other offices in other places. When they find a flat field with hardly any stones in, and is very flat they put the seed on and roll it.When the seed has sprouted they cut it frequently to encourage root growth.The cut grass is left on the ground to wither and provide nutrients When the turf is ready they cut it off with big machines into thin layers.They put these layers of turf onto palettes and load the palettes onto a lorry.Then lorries deliver the turf to customers.
